timeline.message: Add link to APS changelog entry

Merge branch 'aps-fetcher' of https://github.com/augustjanse/jabref into adsfetcher

* 'aps-fetcher' of https://github.com/augustjanse/jabref:
  Add link to APS changelog entry
  Parameterize ApsFetcherTest
  Refactor getId()
  Refactor findFulltext()
  Add note about APS fetcher
  Refactor ApsFetcher
  Fix case sensitivity bug
  Add APS fetcher

timeline.author: tobiasdiez
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,6 +40,8 @@ Note that this project **does not** adhere to [Semantic Versioning](http://semve
 - Filenames of external files can no longer contain curly braces. [#5926](https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/pull/5926)
 - We made the filters more easily accessible in the integrity check dialog. [#5955](https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/pull/5955)
 - We reimplemented and improved the dialog "Customize entry types". [#4719](https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/issues/4719)
+- We reimplemented and improved the dialog "Customize entry types" [#4719](https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/issues/4719)

timeline.bodyText: This should be debug or warn
timeline.author: tobiasdiez
tobiasdiez

replies.bodyText: It's info at the other fetchers as well
replies.author: Siedlerchr

timeline.bodyText: To be honest, I don't see any need to have a parameterized test. As the comments indicate the tests actually check different cases and behaviours. It just happens that the test code is almost the same. Since the code reusage of the parameterized test is minimal, I would prefer if the tests could be split.
timeline.author: tobiasdiez
